title: [Gameplay] Keybinds stop working
body:
Heya guys, just returned to LoL not too long ago and started really getting into the game. However, I've been experiencing an interesting bug where my keybinds just don't work, starting at the beginning of the game. 

I load into the game, just like any other game. I will pick my first spell, run out to lane, leash, etc.

Once I begin the laning phase, I will attempt to harass, poke, etc. with said spell. However, the spell never triggers.

Normally I will wait a level or 2 to see if any of my keybinds will work for any spell, and it just doesn't happen. Flash, ignite, items, etc. do not work either.

Here's the kicker: all of my spells will work if I hit the windows button+ the designated key for the spell (ie, windows+Q will let me actually fire my Q spell). 

I'm not a huge fan of maneuvering my hands all wonky to use 1 spell, as it feels a lot more fluid using 1 key compared to 2. 

The only fix I have found so far is to leave the game and re-log into the client.

It seems to be fairly random; I haven't really seen any set pattern as far as when it occurs; I just can't use spells sometimes, and other times it works just fine.

I don't have any issues once the keybinds are working; they will NOT just randomly stop working. They either work from beginning to end or don't. 

Thanks for reading, I hope to gain some insight and possibly some prevention or fixes to this issue, as my computer is a little slow and those few minutes spent logging are very precious in this game!

replies.body:
Yikes that's no good. We can typically get those keybinds reset pretty easily, but do keep in mind that this will fully reset any keybinds you set up yourself.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
